h2.span:
Christina School District schools and offices will be closed to the public March 16-May 15, 2020.
For updates and resources, visit our Coronavirus website.

a.title: Go to comments for Schools Closed March 16-May 15

a.span: Updated: CSD Board Approves Adjusted 2019-2020 SY Calendars

div.p: The Christina Board of Education approved adjusted school calendars for the 2019-2020 school year on Tuesday, April 7th.

a.title: Go to comments for Updated: CSD Board Approves Adjusted 2019-2020 SY Calendars

img.alt: 2020-2021 Academic Calendar. We need your feedback on

a.span: CSD Seeks Feedback on 2020-2021 School Year Calendars

div.p: Share Your Feedback! 2020-2021 proposed academic school year calendars are now available for review.

a.title: Go to comments for CSD Seeks Feedback on 2020-2021 School Year Calendars

img.alt: Photo of Latino student working on laptop at home with text overlay

div.p: Christina’s expanded model of instructional delivery will begin on Monday, April 6th. In addition to providing learning packets, we will be launching additional remote learning opportunities.

a.title: Go to comments for CSD Update: March 27, 2020

a.span: Christina School District Board Vacancy - District B

div.p: The Christina Board of Education seeks interested applicants to fill a vacancy on the School Board for District B.

a.title: Go to comments for Christina School District Board Vacancy - District B

img.alt: Newark High student Maudee Devlin Butterfly photo

a.span: #CSDintheNews: Butterflies showcased in Newark High's online art exhibit

div.p: While most people are cooped up at home due to the coronavirus pandemic, a new project by Newark High School art students provides some springtime beauty to break up the monotony.

a.title: Go to comments for #CSDintheNews: Butterflies showcased in Newark High's online art exhibit

img.alt: Angie McAdoo and others delivering to items to displaced students

a.span: Christina School District devotes time and resources to feeding students and families on Easter weekend

div.p: Angie McAdoo who is Christina’s District McKinney Vento Liaison was out on Saturday handing out food, learning materials and first aid supplies to our students.

a.title: Go to comments for Christina School District devotes time and resources to feeding students and families on Easter weekend

div.span: The Christina School District is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, national origin, citizenship, age, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other categories protected by federal, state, or local law. Inquiries regarding compliance with the above may be directed to the Title IX/Section 504 Coordinator, Christina School District, 600 North Lombard Street, Wilmington, DE 19801; Telephone: (302) 552-2600.
